data.message: Intersphere performance optimization - full deployment: Successfully deployed both backend (Render) and frontend (Vercel) optimizations. Changes: 1) Parallelized category + image fetch with asyncio.gather() (1-2s savings), 2) Changed include_quiz default to false on backend AND frontend (2-3s savings), 3) Created prewarm_cache.py script. Verified via Render logs that frontend is now sending include_quiz=false. Cached responses under 1 second. Expected cold topic improvement: 8s → 3-4s.
data.outcome: Successfully deployed both backend (Render) and frontend (Vercel) optimizations. Changes: 1) Parallelized category + image fetch with asyncio.gather() (1-2s savings), 2) Changed include_quiz default to false on backend AND frontend (2-3s savings), 3) Created prewarm_cache.py script. Verified via Render logs that frontend is now sending include_quiz=false. Cached responses under 1 second. Expected cold topic improvement: 8s → 3-4s.
